original_text: These were the sons of Judah's son, Shelah: Er, Laadah, Jokim, Joash, Saraph and Jashubi-Lehem. Er became the father of Lecah. Laadah became the father of Mareshah. Joash and Saraph both married women from Moab and they returned to live in Lehem. Other clans that were descendants of Shelah worked with linen at Beth-Ashbea, and some lived in Cozeba. (These lists are from old history books.)
korean_text: 또 요김과 고세바 사람들과 요아스와 모압을 다스리던 사랍과 야수비네헴이니 이는 다 옛 기록에 의존한 것이라

sentences.original_text: These were the sons of Judah's son, Shelah:
Er, Laadah, Jokim, Joash, Saraph and Jashubi-Lehem.
sentences.korean_translation: 에르, 라아다, 요김, 요아스, 사랍, 그리고 야수비-레헴.

sentences.original_text: Er became the father of Lecah.
Laadah became the father of Mareshah.
Joash and Saraph both married women from Moab
sentences.korean_translation: 요아스와 사랍은 모두 모압 여자들과 결혼했으며

sentences.original_text: and they returned to live in Lehem.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 레헴에 살기 위해 돌아왔습니다.

sentences.original_text: Other clans that were descendants of Shelah
These lists are from old history books.
sentences.korean_translation: 이 목록들은 옛 역사책에서 나온 것입니다.
